plot: A Bigot visits the Hall of Past Lives and discovers that he has a lot more in common with the object of his racism than he imagined.
title: Hall of Past Lives
plot_es: A Bigot visits the Hall of Past Lives and discovers that he has a lot more in common with the object of his racism than he imagined.
plot_en: A Bigot visits the Hall of Past Lives and discovers that he has a lot more in common with the object of his racism than he imagined.
